DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose program see whether periodically measure CA-125 ( tumor marker ) level blood undergoing transvaginal ultrasound time effective early detection ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Cancer Screening Program Women High Risk Developing Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The program offer twice yearly CA-125 blood test annual transvaginal ultrasound monitor woman high risk ovarian cancer . In addition main purpose provide ovarian cancer screening , researcher would also like build repository blood specimen use ovarian breast cancer research offer genetics counsel session help educate woman risk-reducing option .
DOC.criteria: Must meet one follow : The family contain least two ovarian breast cancer subject first second degree relative subject . The subject Ashkenazi Jewish ethnicity one first degree two seconddegree relative breast ovarian cancer , subject Ashkenazi ancestry breast cancer . The subject male relative breast cancer diagnose age . Probability carry BRCA1/2 mutation give family pedigree breast ovarian cancer exceed 20 % ( determined BRCAPRO 95 % posterior probability interval ) . Prior ovarian cancer peritoneal carcinomatosis A first second degree relative BRCA1/2 mutation test negative exactly mutation . The subject ovary . Less 30 year age , unless 2530 BRCA I II mutation confirm Currently pregnant Currently receive adjuvant chemotherapy radiation therapy cancer ( exclude tamoxifen ) . Patients treat local disease may enroll 3 month completion last treatment ( exclude tamoxifen ) . Treatment ( exclude tamoxifen ) prior metastatic malignancy within past five year . Intraperitoneal surgery within last 3 month .
DOC.keyword: Women increase risk develop ovarian cancer
